com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api

Class ProcessorJobEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.api.ProcessorJobEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class ProcessorJobEnvironment
extends java.lang.Thread

    This class is used to run and manage individual ProcessorJobs. Each ProcessorJob is run by it its own unique ProcessorJobEnvironment. The ProcessorJobEnvironment is used to load the ProcessorJob subclass, prepare its running environment, and clean up after the ProcessorJob when it has finished running.

    This class also provides an essential interface between the node and individual jobs, allowing jobs to access the public API.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Field Detail

      • node

        private ProcessorNode node

        The running ProcessorNode instance.

      • job

        private ProcessorJob job

        The ProcessorJob this ProcessorJobWrapper runs.

      • listener

        private final ProcessorJobEnvironment.ProcessorJobStateListener listener

        A listener that will respond to updates to the state of the ProcessorJob.

      • watchdog

        private final Watchdog watchdog

        The Watchdog for the current node. Used to create and destroy beacons when running the ProcessorJob.

      • cleanup

        private final boolean cleanup

        Whether the class and associated files should automatically be cleaned after termination. This will only be true for remote jobs.

      • type

        private final java.lang.Class<? extends ProcessorJob> type

        This is the dynamically loaded subclass. An instance of this will be created when this ProcessorJobWrapper is started.

      • sourceJob

        private final RemoteProcessorJob sourceJob

        The parent / creator of this ProcessorJobWrapper's ProcessorJob. It will be null for locally created jobs.

      • classPath

        private final java.io.File classPath

        The folder under which the ProcessorJob may create files.

      • initData

        private final java.io.File initData

        The initialization parameters for the ProcessorJob (defined by the ProcessorJob).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessorJobEnvironment

        public ProcessorJobEnvironment(ProcessorNode node,
                       java.lang.String className,
                       java.io.File classPath,
                       RemoteNode source,
                       java.lang.String remotePid,
                       java.io.File initData,
                       Watchdog watchdog,
                       boolean cleanup,
                       ProcessorJobEnvironment.ProcessorJobStateListener listener)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Instantiates a ProccessorJobWrapper with the parameters needed to start a new ProcessorJob.

        Parameters:
        node - The running ProcessorNode instance.
        className - The name of the ProcessorJob subclass to load.
        classPath - The path to the directory that contains the ProcessorJob subclass class file.
        source - The node that sent the ProcessorJob to this node, or null if the job is to be created locally.
        remotePid - The thread id of the ProcessorJob that sent the ProcessorJob to load to this node.
        initData - The initialization parameters for the ProcessorJob.
        watchdog - The Watchdog for this node.
        cleanup - Whether the files created should be deleted after the job has completed
        listener - A ProcessorJobWrapperListener to handle events related to startup.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
